biotools.summary: MAUI (MBI Analysis User Interface) is an image processing pipeline for Multiplexed Mass Based Imaging. MIBI_GUI is a set of three graphical user interfaces (GUIs) for low-level analysis of MIBI data. The three steps of low-level analysis (after you've extracted your data) are background removal, denoising, and aggregate removal.
